Title: 34 lawyers fail integrity test, dropped from Federal High Court judgeship race
Summary: 34 lawyers nominated for appointment as Judges of the Federal High Court of Nigeria (FHC) have failed the integrity test . The integrity test was carried out by a group of lawyers . The judgeship race has been dropped from the race .

Title: Edo police arrest suspect for macheting returnee to death
Summary: The Edo State Police Command has arrested a suspect identified as Amadin William for allegedly killing a 43-year-old . Eghosa Osaikhuowuomwan, popularly known as Didi, was killed in Oben community .

Title: Gunmen kill 2 in Gombe, abduct housewife, others
Summary: Unknown gunmen in the early hours of Sunday stormed Pindiga town in the Akko Local Government Area (LGA) of Gombe State . The gunmen also abducted a housewife, her two children, and one other woman .

Title: Buni emerges APC conflict resolution, strategic mobilisation committee chair
Summary: Governor Mai Mala Buni of Yobe State speaks in measured and reassuring terms . He listens patiently, with observations that result in a generous smile and a captivating character of humility . Buni emerges APC conflict resolution, strategic mobilisation committee chair .

Title: CPPE projects 4.5% GDP growth in 2026
Summary: The Centre for the Promotion of Private Enterprise (CPPE) has projected that Nigeriaâ€™s gross domestic product (GDP) will grow between 4.0 and 4.5 per cent in 2026 . In its review of the Nigerian economy in 2025 and outlook for 2026, CPPE said .
